name: jsonresume-theme-randytarampi
description: A JSON resume theme for www.randytarampi.ca

scripts.build: npm run build:babel && npm run build:styles
scripts.postinstall: npm run resume:json && npm run build
scripts.resume: npm run resume:json && npm run resume:pdf && npm run resume:html
scripts.start:server: npm run kill:server; node ./server.js & echo $! > /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.jsonresume-theme.server.pid; echo "Started server (`cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.jsonresume-theme.server.pid`) from /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.jsonresume-theme.server.pid";
scripts.kill:server: if [ -f /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.jsonresume-theme.server.pid ]; then echo "Killing server (`cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.jsonresume-theme.server.pid`) from /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.jsonresume-theme.server.pid"; kill -9 `cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.jsonresume-theme.server.pid`; rm /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.jsonresume-theme.server.pid; fi;
scripts.resume:pdf: npm run start:server; npm run resume:letter & npm run resume:a4 & npm run resume:legal; npm run kill:server
scripts.resume:letter: RESUME_PDF_SIZE=Letter NODE_ENV=puppeteer CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=resume CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=letter,$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") npx resume export resume.letter.pdf --force -f pdf --theme randytarampi && (cp resume.letter.pdf letter.pdf 2>/dev/null || :)
scripts.resume:a4: RESUME_PDF_SIZE=A4 NODE_ENV=puppeteer CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=resume CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=a4,$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") npx resume export resume.a4.pdf --force -f pdf --theme randytarampi && (cp resume.a4.pdf a4.pdf 2>/dev/null || :)
scripts.resume:legal: RESUME_PDF_SIZE=Legal NODE_ENV=puppeteer CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=resume CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=legal,$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") npx resume export resume.legal.pdf --force -f pdf --theme randytarampi && (cp resume.legal.pdf legal.pdf 2>/dev/null || :)
scripts.resume:html: NODE_ENV=puppeteer CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=resume CAMPAIGN_MEDIUM=html CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") npx resume export resume.html --force -f html --theme randytarampi
